movie_title: Interpol crackdown on illicit pharmaceuticals worth US$1.5m in Malaysia
introduction: One of the world's largest crackdowns on online sales of illicit pharmaceuticals has just wrapped up
lead_intro: Discover how authorities uncovered illicit medicine in a recent raid and the global impact of cracking down on illegal pharmaceuticals.

quiz.question: How many doses of fake or unregistered products were seized worldwide in the global operation?
quiz.explanation: The global operation resulted in the seizure of more than 50 million doses of fake or unregistered products worldwide.

quiz.question: What is the main focus of the Malaysian Health Ministry in combating illegal pharmaceuticals?
quiz.explanation: While stepping up enforcement, the Malaysian Health Ministry is also prescribing greater public awareness as the first line of defense in the fight against unverified medicines and health products.

quiz.question: How many countries were involved in the 17th edition of the largest global crackdown on online trade of illicit pharmaceuticals?
quiz.explanation: Malaysia was one of 90 countries involved in the 17th edition of the largest global crackdown on online trade of illicit pharmaceuticals.

quiz.question: What was the total value of health products seized by Malaysian authorities during the raid?
quiz.explanation: Authorities seized more than 7 million ringit or $1.6 million US worth of health products during the operation.

quiz.question: What is highlighted as a significant risk associated with unregistered products in the video?
quiz.explanation: The trade in counterfeit medicine is highlighted as a threat to public health, linked to more than a million deaths each year according to the World Health Organization.
